From the brand

WHO WE ARE ?

Mythinglogic was founded in 1999, and is committed to become the most helpful brand in garage storage solution area, aiming to enable an easy garage organizing experience.

WHAT WE DO ?

We offer a wide range of products including all kinds of sports equipment storage racks ,golf storage racks, yoga storage racks as well as tool storage racks.

CLICK TO STORE

CLICK TO STORE

CLICK TO STORE

HOME GYM STORAGE RACK

SPORTS EQUIPMENT STORGE

GOLF GEAR STORGE RACK

GARDEN TOOL RACK

WALL MOUNT SPORTS RACK

SPECIAL DESIGN SPORTS STORAGE ORGANIZER : This sports gear storage stand is an upgraded version for garage storage.It combines a ball storage with golf bag organizer. And it has 4 extra shelves and basket, which can be used to store sports accessories, fitness or tools for your garage.
MULTIFUNCTIONAL STORAGE: This sports rack organizer features with 6 Baseball bat rack,6 movable hanging hooks and 5 bat holder on the side. All those storage accessories can help to store your sports bat , helmet and sports accessories. Make your garage tidy and well organized.
ELASTIC STRAPS DESIGN: This ball rack gets 5 elastic straps. This unique design maximizes storage space of the ball storage bin and allows easier access to the items at the bottom.
HEAVY DUTY STEEL MATERIAL: The ball storage rack is made of high quality steel with powder coated finish and very strong.Since the height is tall and weight is heavy ,for your safety, please install it with screws on the wall.
DIMENSIONS: Overall product size of this sports organizer is 62.0″ L x 13.0″ W x 65.7″ H. And size of the Golf bag stand is 24’’L x 15.7’’W x 48’’H which can hold up to 2 standard golf bags.

It is an attractive, functional storage rack that fits into the garage.And it holds clubs (full bags), and a host of balls, all kind of sports gear, shoes and tools on the five racks. The rack tubing is finished on all ends ,so no jagged ends to scratch things.And the fully assembled unit is very sturdy. And this garage storage shelves is designed for organizing golf equipment and all kind of sports equipment. All-in-one sports storage racks for your garage.

WHAT’S IN PACKAGE:

1 x Sports storage rack

(Assemble required)

1 x Instruction Manual

1 x Some hardware

Read more

PRODUCT DETAILS:

BAT RACK

This sports equipment storage rack features 5 bat holder, can hold baseball bat or Rugby stick or golf stick firmly.

MOVABALE HOOKS

There are some moveable hooks,as you can place any places on sides,so that they create space for hanging lots of different items like coat, hat, lifejacket,bags,sport shoes,etc.

BASEBALL BAT RACK

This sport equipment storage rack equipped with bat rack which can hold 2 baseball rack. Will protect your essential items and lock it firmly in place.

ELASTIC STRAPS

This ball bins gets some elastic straps. This unique design maximizes storage space and allows easier access to the items at the bottom.

Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! KERNOWO LED LIGHTS

106 Solar Lights Outdoor with Independent Solar Panel 2 Pack

Solar Lights Outdoor

Super bright outside solar flood light, perfect for your outdoor use.

KERNOWO led lights

【Four Modes Adjustable】Four adjustable modes by pressing the button on the back of the solar outdoor light and the remote. Mode 1: Auto on at night, and motion sensor off. Mode 2: Strong light of 15s when motion is detected, and low light after people leave. Mode 3: Strong light of 15s when motion is detected, and turn off after people leave. Mode 4: Light fashes at night.
【Flexible Use】The solar panel of the solar led lights can be placed independently of the light body, and connected by a 16.5 ft wire to ensure maximum charging. Aslo you can put them together.
【Super Bright Light Beads】Equiped with 106 LED high light beads and an illumination of 180° wide, the solar lights outdoor can provide 500sq.ft and 3000LM lighting. 3000mAh lithium battery has a larger capacity to provide more efficient charging and more lasting lighting.
【Weatherproof & Durable】Built with IP65 Waterproof,the solar panel lights outdoor body is sturdy enough and the wire connection is sealed.It still works well in rainy and cold days and hot summer.

The upper layer used to storage tools and hand drills. The middle layer is for charging stations, battery, tool box etc. The 4 drill hanging slots are for power drills, saws etc. The side racks are for pliers and hammers.

Screwdriver Organizer

4 Drill Holders

MADE FOR MOST TOOL ORGANIZATION: This tool organizer adopts unique multifunctional storage design with 15 holes for screwdrivers holder, 4 racks for pliers storage and two flat shelves to place other power tools. This tool storage helps you keep all your commonly used project tools neatly organized and within your arm’s reach.
THICKEN HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL: Compared with other utility racks which made of thin wire, our drill holder has greater bearing capacity. It is made of thicken heavy compact steel metal, and the joint of the shelf uses a reinforced design. This shelf is strong enough to withstand a person of 50kgs.
REMOVABLE AND EASY TO INSTALL: The power tool organizer has a simple structure and easy to move. It comes with wrench, drywall anchors and pan head screws. It takes only a few minutes to install it, just need to drill holes and install screws. The installation guide is provided for you to check.
WIDE RANGE OF USES: Our power tool organizer wall mount is perfect to organize all kinds of garage stuff. And it’s widely used as screwdriver organizer, electric drill charging station and Father’s Day gift. It’s suitable for garage, tools room warehouse and so on due to its perfect size.
SATISFACTION SERVICE: Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this drill holder wall mount. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours. And we offer a 1-year guarantee on this product. Don’t worry about it.

Product Description

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights with 2 GFCI Outlet

Specification

Voltage: 110-125v

Color:White

Power Source: Corded-Electric

14.5 AWG Input Wire

Max Load : 1080w

Installation Type: Hardwired/Wall Mount

Sensing Range: Distance 33FT, Angle 270°

Material: Aluminum & Tempered Glass

Color: Matte Black & Hand-painting Golden Edge

Base Type: E26 Base, 100W Max.

3 Upgraded Motion Sensor Lighting Modes

Just turn the wall switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2sec. to shift to manual mode, keeping 100% brightness at night for 8 hours, but will auto turn off at dawn.

Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection.

These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected. (It is the high mode when it arrives)

Easy access to any outdoor activity when you need power

About GFCI Outlet

Simply turn on the light and plug in your security cameras, party party décor, power tools, garden tools, etc.

Plugged the device into the GFCI outlet, if the device is not powered, please check the following steps:

1) Please check whether the device is plugged into the GFCI outlet tightly.

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

Weather Resistance & Durability

About GFCI Outlet

Simply turn on the light and plug in your security cameras, party party décor, power tools, garden tools, etc.

Plugged the device into the GFCI outlet, if the device is not powered, please check the following steps:

1) Please check whether the device is plugged into the GFCI outlet tightly.

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.
